subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 140454
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
954 PM PDT FRI APR 13 2007

..HIGH SURF DECREASING AT THE BEACHES...

..SURF COULD INCREASE SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING...

SURF IS DECREASING AT THE BEACHES THIS EVENING AND HAS FALLEN
BELOW ADVISORY CRITERIA. HOWEVER...A RAPIDLY APPROACHING TROUGH OF
LOW PRESSURE WILL MOVE OVER THE AREA THROUGH WEEKEND POSSIBLY
BRINGING AN INCREASE IN SURF ONCE AGAIN.

CAZ040-041-140600-
/O.EXP.KLOX.SU.Y.0006.000000T0000Z-070414T0500Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
954 PM PDT FRI APR 13 2007

..HIGH SURF ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING...

THE HIGH SURF ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

SURF HAS FALLEN BELOW ADVISORY CRITERIA AND THE ADVISORY HAS BEEN
ALLOWED TO EXPIRE. HOWEVER...A RAPIDLY APPROACHING TROUGH OF LOW
PRESSURE WILL MOVE OVER THE AREA THROUGH WEEKEND POSSIBLY BRINGING
AN INCREASE IN SURF ONCE AGAIN.

$$

CAZ034-035-140600-
/O.CAN.KLOX.CF.S.0004.000000T0000Z-070414T0500Z/
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
954 PM PDT FRI APR 13 2007

SURF HAS FALLEN BELOW ADVISORY CRITERIA AND THE ADVISORY HAS BEEN
ALLOWED TO EXPIRE. HOWEVER...A RAPIDLY APPROACHING TROUGH OF LOW
PRESSURE WILL MOVE OVER THE AREA THROUGH WEEKEND POSSIBLY BRINGING
AN INCREASE IN SURF ONCE AGAIN.

$$
